title: Leaving country for a couple months.... is there anyway not to get demoted for inactivity??
body: thanks in advance for any info

replies.body: Get someone you trust to play a few games each month, if not only one would be fine.

not be in plat or higher
play a game once every 28 days
thanks good bye plat i guess then ;/

Is there anyway you can play on this server from where you are going? you could just find a way to play like one game (yes you would probs lose cuz ping) but it would be better then dropping whole divisions.
You only start decaying once you've reached platinum or higher.
